This creature enters with fifteen -1/-1 counters on it.
Haste, trample, vigilance
[i]Landfall[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, mill a card, then remove a number of -1/-1 counters from this creature equal to the that card's, mana value. If you milled a land this way, put it into your hand.
notes: Invoke 1. (Remove X -1/-1 counters from an Avatar you control. If you don't control an Avatar, create a 20/20 Avatar creature token with nineteen -1/-1 counters first.)
